nodes.text: The Good Tidings was a light freighter owned by the Dressellian smuggler Has Obitt during the Clone Wars. It was agile, making it good at slipping through blockades. Obbitt handled the freighter with skill, which had been learned through years of piloting. Obitt later used the Good Tidings V.

The freighter appears in James Luceno's 2016 canon novel Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel. Although Obitt is said to have two freighters shot down from under him, it was not confirmed if one of them was Good Tidings.
